    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:A210_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>A210_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Approaching prose fiction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nähernde Prosaerfindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiction d'approche de prose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fiction aproximando-se da prosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Romanzo d'avvicinamento di prosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μυθιστοριογραφία πεζογραφίας προσέγγισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ficción de la prosa que se acerca</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Do you want to get more out of your reading? This unit is designed to develop the analytical skills you need for a more in-depth study of literary texts. You will learn about narrative events and perspectives, the setting of novels, types of characterisation and genre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts and History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Analytical_skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Fiction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Literary_texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Narrative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Novels</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Möchten Sie mehr aus Ihrem Messwert heraus 
erhalten? Diese Maßeinheit ist konzipiert, um die analytischen 
Fähigkeiten zu entwickeln, die Sie für eine eingehendere Studie der 
literarischen Texte benötigen. Sie erlernen über erzählende 
Fälle und Perspektiven, die Einstellung der Romane, Typen der 
Kennzeichnung und Genre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voulez-vous obtenir plus hors de votre lecture ? 
Cette unité est conçue pour développer les qualifications 
analytiques que vous avez besoin pour une étude plus appronfondie des
textes littéraires. Vous vous renseignerez sur des événements
et des perspectives narratives, la configuration des romans, les types
de caractérisation et le genre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você quer começar mais fora de sua leitura? 
Esta unidade é projetada desenvolver as habilidades que 
analíticas você necessita para um estudo mais in-depth de textos 
literários. Você aprenderá sobre eventos e perspectives 
narrativos, o ajuste das novelas, tipos de caracterização e genre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Desiderate ottenere più dalla vostra lettura? 
Questa unità è destinata per sviluppare le abilità che 
analitiche avete bisogno di per uno studio più approfondito sui testi
letterari. Imparerete circa gli eventi e prospettive narrative, 
la regolazione dei romanzi, tipi di descrizioni e genere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέλετε να πάρετε περισσότερων από την ανάγνωσή σας; 
Αυτή η μονάδα σχεδιάζεται για να αναπτύξει τις αναλυτικές 
δεξιότητες που χρειάζεστε για μια πιό σε βάθος μελέτη των 
λογοτεχνικών κειμένων. Θα μάθετε για τα αφηγηματικές 
γεγονότα και τις προοπτικές, η τιμή τών παραμέτρων των 
μυθιστορημάτων, τύποι χαρακτηρισμών και υφών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted desea conseguir más de su lectura? 
Esta unidad se diseña para desarrollar las habilidades 
analíticas que usted necesita para un estudio más profundizado de 
textos literarios. Usted aprenderá sobre acontecimientos y las 
perspectivas narrativas, la configuración de novelas, los tipos de 
caracterización y género.</string>
          </description>
